ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_REGISTER_TOLERANCE_LIMIT
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the maximum discrepancy allowed during Cashier/Workstation session reconciliation

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_TOLERANCE_WORKFLOW
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Tolerance limit to be checked at

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_RECEIPT_BAG_REFERENCE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select if it is mandatory to provide bag reference details when making Bank Receipt

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_FLOAT_TOTAL
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the mode for performing Float

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_OVERRIDE_FLOAT
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Allows to select if the float amount can exceed the safe amount

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_SAFE_SPOTCHECK_TYPE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the mode for performing Safe Spot Check

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_LOAN_OVERRIDE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to display a warning if the Loan exceeds the amount in the Cashier/Workstation session

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PAYOUT_TOTAL
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the mode for performing Pay Out

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_DEPOSIT_TYPE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the mode for performing Bank Deposit

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_DEPOSIT_BAG_REFERENCE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select if it is mandatory to provide the bag reference details when making Bank Deposit

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_THRESHOLD_PAYIN_PAYOUT
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Threshold value for deviation from modified tax

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PAYOUT_OVERRIDE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to display a warning if the Pay Out exceeds the amount in the safe

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_RECEIPT_BAG_REFERENCE_MAX_LENGTH
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Maximum length for bag reference field in Bank Receipt

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_REDECLARE_COUNT
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Number of times re-declaration can be done before the submission of declaration
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the maximum number of times a Cashier/Workstation session can be re-declared before finalisation

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_DEPOSIT_OVERRIDE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to display a warning if the Bank Deposit exceeds the amount in the safe

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_SAFE_DISPLAY_MODE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the mode for safe declaration

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_TOLERANCE_MODE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Tolerance limit to be calculated at

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_BANK_RECEIPT_TYPE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the mode for performing Bank Receipt

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_TRANSFER_SAFE_EXCEED
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to display a warning if Safe Transfer exceeds the maximum amount in safe

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_MAX_SAFE_AMOUNT
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the maximum amount that can be maintained in the safe

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PICKUP_TYPE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the mode for performing Pick Up

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_DEPOSIT_BAG_REFERENCE_MAX_LENGTH
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Maximum length for bag reference field in Bank Deposit

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_CHECK_BAG_ID
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: To define bags will be used in the store or not
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to configure if bags will be used in the store

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_RECEIPT_SLIP_REFERENCE_MAX_LENGTH
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Maximum length for slip reference field in Bank Receipt

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_DEPSOIT_SLIP_REFERENCE_MAX_LENGTH
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Maximum length for slip reference field in Bank Deposit

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_DECL_REASONCODE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to display the reason code during finalisation

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_RECEIPT_SLIP_REFERENCE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select if it is mandatory to provide slip reference details when making Bank Receipt

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PAYIN_SAFE_EXCEED
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to display a warning if the maximum safe limit is exceeded during a Pay In

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_LOAN_TYPE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the display mode for Loan

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_RECEIPT_OVERRIDE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to display a warning if the maximum safe limit is exceeded during a Bank Receipt

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_DEPOSIT_SLIP_REFERENCE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select if it is mandatory to provide the slip reference details when making Bank Deposit

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PAYIN_TOTAL
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the mode for performing Pay In

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_SAFE_TOLERANCE_LIMIT
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the maximum discrepancy allowed during safe session reconciliation

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_RECEIPT_SLIP_REFERENCE_MIN_LENGTH
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Minimum length for slip reference field in Bank Receipt

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_SAFE_REDECLARE_COUNT
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the maximum number of times a safe session can be re-declared before finalisation

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_PICKUP_OVERRIDE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select to display a warning if the Pick Up amount exceeds the amount in the Cashier/Workstation session

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_REGISTER_SPOTCHECK_TYPE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the mode for performing Cashier/Workstation Spot Check

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_DEPOSIT_BAG_REFERENCE_MIN_LENGTH
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Minimum length for bag reference field in Bank Deposit

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_WORKSTATION_DISPLAY_MODE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the display mode for Cashier/Workstation declaration

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_RECEIPT_BAG_REFERENCE_MIN_LENGTH
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Minimum length for bag reference field in Bank Receipt

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_DEPOSIT_SLIP_REFERENCE_MIN_LENGTH
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Minimum length for slip reference field in Bank Deposit
